videos.headline: Marks opens up scoring for Buffalo
videos.description: Buffalo running back Kevin Marks powers his way into the end zone for the first score of the game vs. Northern Illinois.

videos.headline: Jackson finds Johnson for 13-yard TD
videos.description: Tyree Jackson throws a dime to Anthony Johnson for another Buffalo touchdown.

videos.headline: Childers finds brown for Huskies TD
videos.description: Marcus Childers find D.J. Brown as Northern Illinois shortens its deficit to Buffalo in the third quarter.

videos.headline: Huskies score TD late in fourth quarter
videos.description: Marcus Childers finds D.J. Brown for a 35-yard Northern Illinois touchdown to give them the lead over Buffalo late in the fourth.

videos.headline: Huskies celebrate MAC Championship
videos.description: Northern Illinois hoists the trophy in the air after defeating Buffalo 30-29 in the 2018 MAC Championship.
